title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - FOX CFB Analyst Joel Klatt on USC to B1G Fallout, Notre Dame Future
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - FOX CFB Analyst Joel Klatt on USC to B1G Fallout, Notre Dame Future
description:
Colin explains why Kyrie to the Lakers makes sense in a crowded LA sports market. Then, FOX Lead College Football analyst Joel Klatt joins Colin to discuss the major repercussions of USC & UCLA joining the Big Ten, what it means for Lincoln Riley and his former school Oklahoma, and if other big schools like Notre Dame and Oregon will follow the same path. They also make their predictions for the College Football Playoff National Title Game this season.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
